Label.en: Nowadays, the chapel does not hold the relics: they have now been moved to Notre-Dame Cathedral
Label.fr: De nos jours la chapelle n'abrite plus de reliques : elles ont été confiées à la Cathédrale Notre-Dame
Label.es: Nowadays, the chapel does not hold the relics: they have now been moved to Notre-Dame Cathedral
Label.zh: Nowadays, the chapel does not hold the relics: they have now been moved to Notre-Dame Cathedral

Label.en: Nevertheless, the Sainte Chapelle still attracts countless visitors: a testament to its beauty… go see it if you have the time!
Label.fr: La Sainte Chapelle attire néanmoins beaucoup de visiteurs. Ils viennnent admirer sa grande beauté...j'espère que tu auras l'occasion de la voir !
Label.es: Nevertheless, the Sainte Chapelle still attracts countless visitors: a testament to its beauty… go see it if you have the time!
Label.zh: Nevertheless, the Sainte Chapelle still attracts countless visitors: a testament to its beauty… go see it if you have the time!
